entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
